thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Karnataka Bank Raises Deposit Interest Rates

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Karnataka Bank Raises Deposit Interest Rates

organizations.name: brief-karnataka bank raises deposit interest rates feb

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Karnataka Bank Ltd:
* SAYS RAISES DEPOSIT INTEREST RATES * INTEREST ON DOMESTIC TERM DEPOSIT FOR PERIOD OF 1 YEAR TO 449 DAYS REVISED TO 7.1 PERCENT FROM 6.9 PERCENT FOR DEPOSITS UP TO 100 MILLION RUPEES
* SAYS INTERESTS ON DOMESTIC TERM DEPOSIT FOR 451 DAYS TO 2 YEARS STANDS REVISED TO 7.10 PERCENT FROM 6.90 PERCENT‍​
* NEW SLAB OF 450 DAYS INTRODUCED WITH RATE OF INTEREST OF 7.25 PERCENT Source text: bit.ly/2BcrSLH Further company coverage:
